{{ #widget : PieChart
  | input = 'CountryName'
  | output = {{ 'Population' }}
  | query = '
    SELECT DISTINCT ?CountryName ?Population WHERE {
     ?Country rdf:type mondial:Country .
     ?Country mondial:name ?CountryName .
     ?Country mondial:population ?Population}
     ORDER BY DESC(?Population)
     LIMIT 10 '
}}
